price: Wọ́n sì pè é ní òpùrọ́. Nítorí náà, ìyà ọjọ́ ẹ̀ṣújò sì jẹ wọ́n. Dájúdájú ó jẹ́ ìyà ọjọ́ ńlá.
arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمۡ عَذَابُ يَوۡمِ ٱلظُّلَّةِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٍ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fakadhabūhu fa-akhadhahum ʿadhābu yawmi al-ẓulati innahu kāna ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
